name: Hidden Object: Detective Story about Ancient Case Premium
summary: Are you ready to accept a new challenge and set off to an incredible journey? Then welcome to the "Detective Story: An Ancient Case", a new mysterious and unique Hidden Object game! Here you will met a girl who will face a difficult task to get to the truth. One day she wakes up in the middle of the night from nightmares and sees a bloodied note beside the bed. Having recognised the address of her best friend, she decides to reveal the secret. Join her in this difficult task.
